Hello! I'm Brandon Edwards. I'm a statistical ecologist, amateur naturalist, and bird photographer. I am currently the Ecological Statistician at Ducks Unlimited Canada's [Institute for Wetland & Waterfowl Research](https://www.ducks.ca/iwwr/).
